question.questionText: The machine you see in the picture is used to load steel beams onto delivery trucks. If there are no hooks or ropes that attach the steel beams to the lifting machine, how is it possible to move the steel beams onto the trucks? How is the machine able to drop the beams onto the truck?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: When the electricity is turned off, the magnetism stops and the machine drops the beam onto the delivery truck.
